I'm looking to book a hotel in Paris for May 1st to May 5th.
Can you suggest a hotel that's under 210? If there are a few choices, go for the one with the highest rating.
Please give me the hotel's name, rating, price range. Also, can you add an event called "Booking hotel {hotel_name}" to my calendar on April 25th 2024, and set the location to the hotel's address? Just to remind me to book ahead of time. Thanks!

To solve this task, I need to find hotels in Paris that are available from May 1st to May 5th and have a price under $210. Then, I'll choose the one with the highest rating. After that, I will add an event to my calendar on April 25th.
I need to find an alternative way to search for hotels in Paris. I can use the 'search' function to look for available hotels in Paris during the specified dates and price range.

hotels in Paris from 2024-05-01 to 2024-05-05, price range $210
